title: US To World: We Don’t Need No Stinking UNFCCC!
description:
The US has withdrawn from UNFCCC and IPCC as well as dozens of organizations involved in climate research and advocacy.

The post US To World: We Don’t Need No Stinking UNFCCC! appeared first on CleanTechnica.
